modName: Musical Lore (Soundtrack Mod By Nir Shor)
summary: This mod Adds Lore friendly professionally produced music tracks to your skyrim playlists.
descriptionHtml:
[center][youtube]l2dxChSeVSA[/youtube][/center]
[img]http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/56083-1-1405645955.jpg[/img]

[center][color=red][size=5]This mod only ADDS music to the vanilla playlist and does not remove any existing tracks furthermore this mod is compatible with all the major music mods out there, it will only add to your existing playlist![/size][/color][/center]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/5m6XKBz.jpg[/img]
[center][youtube]IDeXX8mCngc[/youtube][/center]
[center][img]http://imgur.com/Inli84d.jpg[/img][/center]
[center][color=red][size=5]All the tracks are a high quality FLAC format download![/size][/color][/center]
[url=https://loudr.fm/release/stonewall-district/PFWGY][img]http://imgur.com/60ofcSi.jpg[/img][/url]
[url=https://loudr.fm/release/restless-whispers/7wNta][img]http://imgur.com/ROvtL5W.jpg[/img][/url]
[url=https://loudr.fm/release/dawns-with-fire/3Ywxp][img]http://imgur.com/hM5gsG4.jpg[/img][/url]

[img]http://imgur.com/jXjpTL1.jpg[/img]
[heading][color=a1a2ab]This mod adds lore friendly professionally produced music tracks to your skyrim playlists.
The mod tries to stay true to the original game composer's (Jeremy Soule) style to provide you with beautifully and seamlessly integrated new music to your skyrim experience.
All music has been written by Nir Shor and all rights reserved.[/color][/heading]

[img]http://imgur.com/ZBddyxl.jpg[/img]
[heading][color=a1a2ab]V1.2 Adds a Dragon fighting music + Finale for the track in case that you kill the dragon before the track ends, the dragon fighting music is one of the only few areas in the game i wanted to improve and not just imitate, it still stays true to soules' style by using only orchestra and extensive use of choirs but is much more fast paced and well . . "Epic".
The track was added to several playlists that included "Boss" music including the Civil War playlist, so now you can enjoy the epicness in the civil war battles.
Next track you can expect some awesome Day Explore music, Thanks for reading!
- Nir[/color][/heading]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/voCMYrB.jpg[/img]
[heading][color=a1a2ab]Only the latest version of skyrim is required and no need for any DLC's.
Mod is safe to Install and Uninstall at will and has been cleaned.

Just extract the content of the ZIP file to your Data folder[/color][/heading]
[img]http://imgur.com/6Q5Ua2k.jpg[/img]
[heading][color=a1a2ab]Just overwrite all the files.[/color][/heading]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/sNzsUmh.jpg[/img]
[heading][color=a1a2ab]Just deactivate the mod and then delete all the files.[/color][/heading]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/SvX7HKS.jpg[/img]
[heading][color=a1a2ab]It will work with any other mod, other music mods might provide conflicts I am not sure.[/color][/heading]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/yRQdSUO.jpg[/img]
[heading][color=a1a2ab]Can go anywhere in the load order.[/color][/heading]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/eT343kX.jpg[/img]
[heading][color=a1a2ab]My name is Nir Shor and i have been composing for well over 8 years now and i have a youtube channel with all my compositions and famous soundtrack orchestral rock covers, if you guys need some unique music for your Home/Land/City mod feel free to message me, i would be happy to compose music for use in the Skyrim universe!

Nexus User: Fustru
Email: asfustrun@gmail.com
[url=https://www.youtube.com/user/NirShor]YouTube[/url]
[url=https://www.facebook.com/NirShorComposer]Facebook Fan Page[/url][/color][/heading]
[img]http://imgur.com/JrgLHAm.jpg[/img]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56084/?][img]http://imgur.com/OLja48m.jpg[/img][/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57371/?][img]http://imgur.com/mukc5wU.jpg[/img][/url]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/goAI1QG.jpg[/img]
[heading][color=a1a2ab]All the music of in this mod has been produced and composed by Nir Shor and all the rights are reserved to him.
The songs can be used on any "TES V: Skyrim" related content on youtube under the condition that my name appears either at the video outro or video info and only after contacting me with the intention of using it, with a provided link to the content.
Any other usage is STRICKLY FORBBIDEN without my strict permission!
You may not upload my file to any other website.[/color][/heading]


WATCH STONEWALL DISTRICT LIVE HERE -
[center][youtube]T2WzsRcB6WQ[/youtube][/center]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/fallout4/mods/14531/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/US7IEjd.jpg[/img][/url]
[url=https://www.youtube.com/user/NirShor][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/56083-1-1405650539.jpg[/img][/url]
author: Nir Shor

files.name: Musical Lore V1.2
files.changelogHtml:
V1.0
[*]Added the track Stonewall District to the town playlist.
V1.1
[*]Added the track Restless Whispers to the regular dungeon playlist.
V1.2
[*]Added the track Dawns with Fire to the Boss,Combat and Civil War playlists.
